series.nome_serie: How to get Away With a Murder
series.descricao: A group of ambitious law students and their brilliant criminal defense professor become involved in a twisted murder plot that promises to change the course of their lives.

A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.
While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark Riverdale mysteries.
A disgraced, dissatisfied civil lawyer-turned-beauty pageant coach takes on a vengeful, bullied teenager as his client and has no idea what he's about to unleash upon the world.
The adventures of Superman's cousin in her own superhero career.

The adventures in time and space of the Doctor, a Time Lord who changes appearance and personality by regenerating when near death, and is joined by companions in battles against aliens and other megalomaniacs.
Explores the high-pressure experiences of the first responders who are thrust into the most frightening, shocking and heart-stopping situations.
Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for thousands of years.
Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their great-uncle's tourist trap in the enigmatic Gravity Falls, Oregon.
A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.
Four friends band together against an anonymous foe who threatens to reveal their darkest secrets, while also investigating the disappearance of their best friend.
Erick Jacquin do his best to save restaurants from imminent collapse.
Meet a child genius named Sheldon Cooper; (already seen as an adult in A Teoria do Big Bang (2007)) and his family. Some unique challenges face Sheldon who seems socially impaired.
Four people and their otherworldly frienemy struggle in the afterlife to define what it means to be good.
An anthology series featuring rampaging serial killers leaving carnage in their wake as their next victims fight to stay alive.
Saving the world from an evil madman? Not a problem for this kid. Finding his birth parents? That's the real adventure!
